title: Duplicate all connections after modifying connection list
author: shawnshaw
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->
Hello everyone I am suffering an issue that all connections are duplicated in the list after i use one user to modify the connection information. I am using sql server as connection pool and i have restored the db. Please help me how to change the information without hands on other connections that I  dont want to change. thanks !!!

comments.snippet: Triage refresh (P2): this issue has been inactive for a long time. Please retest on the latest build and share reproducible steps, expected vs actual behavior, and logs/screenshots. If there is no confirmation/update, maintainers can close it as stale or not reproducible.
